message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $15,000.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my needs. I appreciate the value of the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the asking price of $15,000. I am willing to offer $10,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly less than what I can accept. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I am still not able to meet the price of $13,500. I am proposing $12,000 as my maximum offer for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
